## 11ë²ˆ ë¬¸ì œ
### $y=cosx\sqrt{sinx}$ì˜ ìµœëŒ“ê°’ê³¼ ìµœì†Ÿê°’ì„ êµ¬í•˜ì—¬ë¼.
$sinx >= 0$ ì´ë¯€ë¡œ $x \in [0 + 2Ï€n, \pi + 2Ï€n], n âˆˆ ð•Ÿ$  

$yâ€²=-sinx\sqrt{sinx}+cosx\frac{1}{2\sqrt{sinx}}cosx$  
$=\frac{cos^2 x - 2sin^2 x}{2\sqrt{sinx}}$  
$=\frac{1 - 3sin^2 x}{2\sqrt{sinx}}$  
$sin^x = \frac{1}{3}$  
$sin x = Â±\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}$  


# 4ìž¥2ì ˆ
## 2ë²ˆ ë¬¸ì œ
### 1
$sin y$  
= $\sqrt{1-cos^2 y}$  
= $\sqrt{1-(cos(cos^{-1}))^2}$  
= $\sqrt{1-x^2}$

### 2
$tan y$  
= $\frac{sin y}{cos y}$  
= $\frac{\sqrt{1-x^2}}{cos y}$  
= $\frac{\sqrt{1-x^2}}{x}$, ($x â‰  0$)

### 3
$sin 2y$  
= $2sin y cos y$  
= $2\sqrt{1-x^2}x$

### 4
$cos2y$  
= $2cos^2 y - 1$  
= $2x^2 - 1$
